Pay back friends. Chip in for a birthday gift. Settle up with your work mates straight from your phone. Pay for your rent, or even a yoga class.
Let\'s get started.

You have the right to cancel for a full refund unless your designated recipient has already received the payment. However, since most PayPal payments are received within seconds, you may not be able to cancel your payment and receive a full refund once the payment has been made. To determine whether your payment is eligible for cancellation, log in to paypal.co.uk, select the transaction in your transaction details, and select Cancel, or call PayPal Customer Service on 0800 358 7911.
Send Now

If they say they haven\'t received it, it might be because they\'re using a different email address or mobile number for PayPal. Or they may need to create a free account.
We emailed them a link so they can access the money.
We\'ll let %1$s know straight away that you\'ve sent money. You can see the details in your Activity in case you need them later.

You have the right to cancel for a full refund unless your designated recipient has already received the payment. However, since most PayPal payments are received within seconds, you may not be able to cancel your payment and receive a full refund once the payment has been made. To determine whether your payment is eligible for cancellation, log in to paypal.co.uk, select the transaction in your transaction details, and select Cancel or call us on 0800 358 7911.

If this payment is for an item you've purchased but haven't received or it's not as described, your purchase may be eligible for PayPal's Buyer Protection. In these cases, you can open a dispute in the Resolution Centre within 180 days of payment. Just log in to PayPal at www.paypal.co.uk and go to the Resolution Centre or call us on 0800 358 7911.

If you have a different problem with this payment sent to someone outside the United States – for example, the payment was never received, or it was processed for the wrong amount – you have up to 180 days to open a dispute. To open a dispute for this payment or to request a written explanation of your rights, go to the Resolution Centre or call Customer Service.

If you don't recognise this payment or want to report it as unauthorised, you should contact the Resolution Centre or call Customer Service.
Transaction fee
Regulations require us to take a closer look at some transactions. Your payment is pending while we review it.
To comply with regulations and to help keep your account secure, we need a few more details about this person and their country of residence.
Non-PO box address
Your card issuer will determine the currency conversion rate and the fees they may charge. Check your statement for the final amount.
The card issuer will determine the conversion rate and the final amount will be on your card or bank statement.
This rate includes our conversion fee.
Send cash to your folks back home or top up a family member\'s mobile phone instantly. Simply choose a country and discover new ways of sending money to your loved ones with PayPal and Xoom.
Let\'s get started.
Xoom is a PayPal service that provides a range of delivery options to countries or regions around the world. Learn more
To an email address or mobile number
Deposit to a bank
Send cash for pickup
Top up a mobile phone
Transaction fee
In addition to the transaction fee, Xoom also makes money when currency conversion is involved. Xoom rounds to the nearest whole %1$s.
In addition to the transaction fee, Xoom also makes money when a currency conversion is involved.
* Fees may vary depending on your funding source, transfer amount and currency selection.
We\'re sorry, we can\'t send personal payments to this country or region

Xoom lets you send money, top up mobile phones and pay international bills.
User Agreement
We\'ll link your PayPal information and your stored funding sources to your Xoom account.
If you quit, we\'ll take you back to the delivery methods for this country or region.
To make this payment, claim the money you have waiting or add a card.

A faster way to get paid whenever, wherever you are
Send a request – all you need is an email address or mobile number. Once your money arrives, it goes straight to your PayPal balance.
Let\'s get started.

Any eligible goods or services that you\'re selling are covered by Seller Protection.
Your eligible goods or services are covered by PayPal Buyer Protection.

We\'ll let %1$s know straight away that you\'ve requested a payment. You can see the details in your Activity in case you need them later.
%1$s may pay a fee when sending you the money. If you\'re requesting money for goods or services, you\'ll pay a fee when you receive it. Learn more
